title: Fairy Tale
description: A psychotic ginger vampire. A demonic rooster horse. The Brothers Grimm have broken free from their prison, and are thirsty for blood. This wizard learns that buying books can be deadly, and that his childhood Fairy Tales were not just stories, but dire warningsâ€¦Free for subscribers to my Newsletter at www (dot) shaynesilvers (dot) com.
author: Shayne Silvers
